pages.text: Milk, and tea. What a genius combination! Milk tea appears in many cultures, and Taiwan is one of them. Making milk tea is simple. When a beverage container is filled with black tea, right click the container with a bucket of milk to make milk tea.
Drinking milk tea doesn't remove all potion effects; it only removes some of the harmful potion effects, such as poison, slowness, hunger, weakness, and nausea.

pages.title: Milk Tea
pages.text: Milk tea in a tank, a milk tea bucket and a milk tea bottle.
